results.content: Zeeshan presented exactly the information that I required in the most efficient, well communicated manner. One of the best and most concise courses that I have taken.  I highly recommend it to all who want to quickly grasp the adoption of php in an html environment.

response.content: Thank you Ellen, I'm glad that you finished it and found really useful.

results.content: At first, it was difficult, as South African, to follow the instructor's English pronunciation, but I've got used to it with the second lesson.  This course included all the information I was looking for to get the know-how, without hours and hours of videos with multiple examples of the same thing to struggle through.

response.content: Thank you so much Naomi for a detailed feedback and sharing your experience and I'm glad it helped you learn know-how without hours and hours of videos with multiple examples of the same thing to struggle through.

results.content:
Simple and useful. 
Zeeshan shows how to split your HTML pages into reusable PHP blocks and then use <?php include() ?> to include them into your main file.

I value my time and really appreciate that with this course you don't need to watch many hours of videos and can learn everything in under 40 min.

response.content: Thank you for your appreciation and feedback DT. This will help more people know that with this course they don't need to watch many hours of videos and can learn everything in under 40 min.
